name: Avast, ye Arrtists!
description:
Be a pirate????? Who paints?????? Submission for GADIG's JAMfest (Fall 2021)

----

Guide the adventurous pirate across a treasure map to the X that marks the spot! The pirate will change their movement based on the color you paint each tile.

Controls

  • Paint with Left Click
  • Erase with Right Click
  • Change Colors by Scrolling Mouse Up/Down
  • Press ESCAPE to toggle fullscreen

Credits

  • Programming/Sprites/Audio - Xavier P
  • Additional Programming/GitHub setup - Cole S
  • High Concept/Cursor Sprite/Moral Support - Matthew
